name: SCALPEL 29 CARBON TEAM

features.h1_value: “坚如磐石”通常不是用来形容一个灵活、轻量级越野自行车的术语，但 SPCALPEL 29 凭借其超高的刚性和光滑左撇子前叉，足以用“坚如磐石”来形容。采用 BallisTec 碳纤维和 ECS-TC 中轴技术的手术刀是最高效最精确的XC武器。

h2_value.value_0: The most refined full suspension cross country bike in the world.
h2_value.value_1: Engineered to slice tight switchbacks with its 29er Race Geometry.
h2_value.value_2: So efficient it's like buying fitness… legally.

features.h3_value: RIDER PROFILE XC racers and all-day riders looking for an edge when things get rough.

technology: 超轻量化   29‘er赛用级设计   Press Fit 全碳 BB30   可调节头管   ECS-TC系统

specifications.frame: Scalpel 29, 100mm, BallisTec Hi-MOD Carbon, Zero Pivot seatstay, PF30, 1.5 Si head tube
specifications.fork: Lefty Carbon XLR 100 29, XLR XC damper (Full Sprint), Hybrid Needle Bearing Technology, 45mm offset
specifications.rims: ENVE Carbon Twenty9 XC, tubeless ready
specifications.hubs: Lefty SL front, DT Swiss 350 142x12 rear, 32 hole
specifications.tires: Schwalbe Racing Ralph EVO Snakeskin, 29x2.1", folding, tubeless ready
specifications.stem: Cannondale OPI Adjustable Stem/Steerer V2, 31.8, -15 deg.(S-L), -5 deg.(X)
specifications.headset: Cannondale HeadShok Si w/10mm reversible spacer
specifications.seat_post: FSA K-Force Light carbon, 31.6x350mm (S, M) 400mm (L, X)
specifications.rear_shock: RockShox Monarch XX, 100mm, Full Sprint remote

name: F-SI CARBON TEAM

features.h1_value: 为了创造出这世界上最快的越野赛道速度“火箭“，你需要一些与众不同的点子。非对称补偿后三角和传动装置、新潮的何设计和自定义偏移左撇子前叉，F-SI 的每一个部分都被设计为超高效的系统，只为单纯追求速度的完美集成。

h2_value.value_0: A fully System Integrated approach to race-winning speed.
h2_value.value_1: Designed with the unique Ai offset rear triangle and drivetrain for categor y-leading efficiency, traction and clearance.
h2_value.value_2: The best handling 29'er hardtail in the world, thanks to the custom offset Lefty and System 29 geometry.

features.h3_value: RIDER PROFILE: For XC racers and hardtail purists looking to gain time on their rivals in ever y section of the course.

technology: 非对称集成（Ai）传动系统   更坚硬的后轮   超短的下叉   Ai HOLLOWGRAM 蜘蛛盘   系统级29寸几何架构   SPEED SAVE 微悬浮   SAVE 2 座杆   BALLISTEC 碳纤维

specifications.frame: F-Si Asymmetric, BallisTec Hi-MOD Carbon, SPEED SAVE, PF30A, 1.5 Si Head Tube
specifications.fork: Lefty 2.0 Carbon XLR 100 29, XLR XC damper, Hybrid Needle Bearing Technology, 55mm offset
specifications.crank: Cannondale HollowGram Si, Ai, BB30, XX1 32T
specifications.rims: ENVE Carbon Twenty9 XC, tubeless ready (Ai offset lacing)
specifications.hubs: Lefty SM front, DT Swiss 350, 32 hole (Ai offset lacing)
specifications.tires: Schwalbe Racing Ralph EVO Snakeskin, 29x2.1", folding, tubeless ready

features.h1_value: 与其他的所谓的“震动杀手”不同，全新的 Trigger 不在太多的行程、倾斜的几何结构或松弛的避震系统之间妥协。其全新改进的 Fox DYAD 后避震为骑手提供完美的行程和几何架构，足以应对任何地形。它可能是我们有史以来制造的最全能的山地车，你的车库里只需唯此一辆山地车足矣。

h2_value.value_0: Quite possibly, the perfect all-around mountain bike.
h2_value.value_1: Able to run shred the descents, thanks to its FLOW mode travel and geometry and burly SuperMax fork.
h2_value.value_2: Able to climb like a scared monkey, thanks to its light weight and the short travel and nimble geometry of ELEVATE mode.

features.h3_value:
Rider Profile:
The adventurer who wants to see what’s around the next corner and over the next mountain pass and to do so, wants a bike that climbs as well as it descends.

specifications.frame: Trigger 27.5, 140/85mm, BallisTec Hi-MOD Carbon, PF30, ISCG03, 1.5 Si headtube
specifications.fork: SuperMax 2.0 Carbon PBR 140 27.5, PBR Trail damper, Hybrid Needle Bearing Tech, 50mm offset
specifications.hubs: Mavic CrossMax SLR, Lefty SM front, 142x12 rear
specifications.tires: Schwalbe Racing Ralph SnakeSkin, 27.5x2.25", tubeless ready
specifications.brake: Magura MT6 w/ Storm SL rotors, 180/160mm
specifications.rear_shock: Fox DYAD RT2, 140/85mm adj. travel, 2015 tune

features.h1_value: 世上最成功的耐力赛平台架构，创造出全新的赛道武器，这就是 Jekyll 2015。与世界冠军 Jerome CLemetz 一同工作，我们创造了最新的几何结构结合 SuperMax 前叉避震、增加行程后的全新的 Fox DYAD 后避震以及27.5寸轮组，助力 Jerome CLemetz 获得胜利。你不必像 Jerome CLemetz 一样欣赏其完美的耐力双向性能 - 你只需要一辆最全能的全山地自行车。

h2_value.value_0: An adept climber and aggressive descender.
h2_value.value_1: True two-bikes-in one performance that no other allmountain bike can match.

features.h3_value:
Rider Profile:
Enduro racers, or all-mountain shredders who want to climb fast, but want to descend even faster across the whole range of mountain terrain.

specifications.frame: Jekyll 27.5(650b), 160/95mm, BallisTec Hi-MOD Carbon, BB30, ISCG03, 1.5 Si headtube
specifications.fork: SuperMax 2.0 Carbon PBR 160 27.5, PBR Enduro damper, Hybrid Needle Bearing Tech, 50mm offset
specifications.rims: WTB Team Issue i23, TCS, tubeless ready, 27.5"
specifications.hubs: Lefty SM front, DT Swiss 350 142x12mm rear
specifications.tires: Schwalbe Hans Dampf Snakeskin Trailstar, 27.5x2.35" tubeless ready
specifications.brake: Magura MT7 w/ Storm SL rotors, 180/180mm
specifications.rear_shock: Fox DYAD RT2, 160/95mm adj. travel, 2015 tune

specifications.fork: Lefty Carbon XLR 100 29, XLR XC damper (Full Sprint), Hybrid Needle Bearing Technology, 45mm offset

specifications.hubs: Mavic CrossMax SLR, Mavic Lefty SL front, 142x12 rear
